name: Myrne: The Quest
description: Myrne: The Quest is a single-player, first-person, action-RPG. Get back to the world of the Myrne with its silly humor and discover why the night never goes away in this new region..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and superior versions (7, 8, 10,...) Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: shader model 2.0, generally everything made since 2004 should work. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 540 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: shader model 2.0, generally everything made since 2004 should work. Storage: 540 MB available space
